events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund due to sizing issues and dissatisfaction with the product.
Assigning this refund request to agent Sarah Williams for further handling and customer communication.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your jacket and Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 7834291. The jacket is brand new and still has all the tags attached in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund as soon as you ship the jacket back to us. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and will send the item back tomorrow.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory with the resolution of your request.
Since the refund has been completed and you've confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this support case. Thank you for shopping with us!
